prompt: Read docs/ROADMAP.md + docs/PROJECT-OUTLINE.md, implement the top unchecked items in small tested increments, and keep ROADMAP/OUTLINE & AGENTS.md in sync as you go. At the end make sure tests pass and create git commit with all changes made. Output <promise>JOB_FULLY_COMPLETED</promise> only when entire P0 and P1 from roadmap/outliine are implemented, thoroughly covered by tests and are in a verifiebly working state.
